mapper.insert: insert into ps_work_face_tab (id, mine_id, wf_name, wf_code, wf_type_id, wf_status_id, coal_seam_id, mining_area_id, wf_length, wf_width, wf_thickness, wf_total_reserves, wf_valid_reserves, wf_design_height, hardness, proportion, stop_date) values (#{id},#{mineId}, #{wfName}, #{wfCode}, #{wfTypeId}, #{wfStatusId}, #{coalSeamId}, #{miningAreaId}, #{wfLength}, #{wfWidth}, #{wfThickness}, #{wfTotalReserves}, #{wfValidReserves}, #{wfDesignHeight}, #{hardness}, #{proportion}, #{stopDate})
